content.heading: breeder
content.subhead: Organise jsonschemas to describe message data shapes and generate typescript interfaces (types) in dogstack domains

children.text: breeder: Organise jsonschemas to describe message data shapes and generate typescript interfaces (types) in dogstack domains

content.html:
Run

npm run breed

Test

npm run test (WIP)

Link

You may use npm link to add the bin commands to your path.

Todo

  • [x] parse to interface
  • [x] init yargs cli
  • [ ] stub getter with interface defined as return
  • [ ] tests

Commands

Breed typescript interfaces from jsonschema
breed <cmd> [args]

Commands:
  schema [name]  create a new jsonschema of [name]
  type [name]    create types based on [name]

Options:
  -h, --help  Show help                                                [boolean]

must provide a valid command
